name: Roll and Conquer
description:
Best with 2-players but playable alone.

In this local-multiplayer strategy game you roll dice to advance your troops across the battlefield in multiple directions. If you encircle an area, you take over every space inside it! Capture the most castles to win the game!

THE RULES

The goal is to take over half of the castles on the map! You do so by surrounding them with your coloured tiles!

Roll two dice, choose one of them!

Choose a square on the grid to begin your advance

The higher the dice roll, the more directions you can advance in, but your lines will be shorter.

Dice roll 1 - Can make 1 line of six squares

Dice roll 2 - Can make 2 lines of five squares each

Dice roll 3 - Can make 3 lines of four squares each

Dice roll 4 - Can make 4 lines of three squares each

Dice roll 5 - Can make 5 lines of two squares each

Dice roll 6 - Can make 6 lines of one square each

Use your lines to try and surround each castle, and take over the castle!

But beware! Your opponent can capture your castle by surrounding the castle with their OWN coloured tiles.

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.
